revised_title: Nervous Structures and Ganglia of the Human Uterus
tldr: The author conducted extensive dissections and research on the nervous system of the human uterus, particularly during pregnancy. They discovered four major plexuses and several ganglia that form the uterus' nervous system, which play a crucial role in its functions. The study also refutes previous misconceptions about the role of nerves in the uterus during pregnancy.
